author: undetermined
full_text:
BSc Nursing Equivalent To MBBS? Viral Circular Found To Be Fake

Claim:
Nurses to be known as nursing officers, BSc nursing equivalent to MBBS and they will be considered as junior doctors, according to the Indian Nursing Council.

Fact:
Newschecker first ran a keyword search for "BSc nursing nursing officers MBBS", which did not throw up any credible news reports of such a decision. We looked up the website of the Indian Nursing Council, where we did not find any relevant statement or circular.

On researching further, we came across a tweet dated June 7, 2023, by Dhruv Chauhan, national zonal coordinator, Indian Medical Association-Medical Students Network, who said the circular is fake.

We also came across a tweet by the Ministry of Health, dated June 8, 2023, clearly stating that the "Indian Nursing Council" circular, announcing that nurses will be known as nursing officers and that BSc nursing will be considered equivalent to MBBS, is fake.

A tweet by PIB Fact Check, dated June 8, 2023, also confirmed that the viral circular is fake.

Result: False

Sources:
- Tweet, Ministry of Health, June 8, 2023
- Tweet, Dr. Dhruv Chauhan, June 7, 2023

If you would like to fact-check a claim, give feedback, or lodge a complaint, WhatsApp us at 9999499044 or email us at checkthis@newschecker.in.
title:
In a tweet, dated June 8, 2023, the  Ministry of Health clearly stated that the “Indian Nursing Council” circular, announcing that nurses will be known as nursing officers and that BSc nursing will be considered equivalent to MBBS, is fake.
Read our full fact check to know more
vclaim: A viral circular claiming BSc Nursing is equivalent to MBBS and nurses will be known as nursing officers and considered junior doctors was found to be fake.
